text: The Jagtap Koli (also spelled as Jugtap Koli) is a Clan (Gotra, Kutumb) of the Koli caste found in the Indian states of Maharashtra, Goa and Karnataka and the Union Territory of the Dadra and Nagar Haveli and nearby areas. == References == == Other websites == *Mahadev Koli clans of Maharashtra Category:Koli clans
title: Jagtap Koli
